TextView.android:text:
1) Go to the main page, click on the search bar and key in the key words to search for a project. Alternatively, you may choose to navigate to the left drawer 'View All Users' to view and search for the profiles of other users.

 2) You will see a list of project titles and project summary. To view a project in greater detail, tap on the listing.

 3) After reading the project details, you will see two buttons 'View Client Profile' and 'Proceed to Collaborate'. Take note that you would only be able to send collaboration requests to projects which have project status: 'Open'. Project status 'Completed' means that the project is no longer open for collaboration.

 4) Click on the 'View Client Profile' to view the project client's information and contact details.

 5) Contact the project owner (client) to indicate your interest and to discuss the project details.

 6) After both parties have agreed on the details, you may proceed to tap 'Proceed to Collaborate' where you will be directed to fill up a Collaboration Form.

 7) A notification will then be sent to the project owner (client) where he/she will view and confirm the collaboration details, followed by making payment based on the base quotation.

 8) Look out for 2 notifications: 
 a) Notification to inform you that the project owner has accepted your request 
 b)Notification to inform you that project owner has transferred payment and that you can start working on the project.

 9) Should you receive a notification which informs you that your collaboration request has been rejected by the project owner, you may wish to contact the project owner to renegotiate the terms and repeat step 6 onwards.

 10) Upon agreement on completion of the project from both parties, the project owner (client) close the project listing to status 'Complete'.

 11) Following that, you will receive a notification that project owner has filed for project completion.

 12) Upon completion of project, the project owner will be required to file for project completion and payment would be made.

 13) You are encouraged to leave feedback after the completion of a project.

 14) Should you encounter any disputes and problem, you may choose to file a report by navigating to the left drawer of the app or simply by clicking on the project under the collaboration tab and you will see an option for file a report at the end of the page.

1) To list a new project, tap the pencil icon on the top right of the main page.

 2) You will then be directed to fill up a form regarding the details of the project.

 3) Your project will be listed and all you need to do is wait for a freelancer to contact you via messaging or the email you have provided in your profile.

 5) Only after you and the freelancer has discussed the project details, the freelancer will fill up a collaboration form and you will receive a notification informing you of a collaboration request, navigate to the request tab of the main page of the app to view the details.

 6) From there, you may view the request in detail by clicking on the item. Check the project details carefully.

 7) If you agree with the details, proceed to 'Accept And Pay'. Then you will be directed to payment page. The payment will be transferred to Scorpius App Team for safekeeping and it will only be transferred to the freelancer when the project has ended.

 8) Should you not agree with the project details, you may 'Reject' and contact the freelancer to renegotiate. The freelancer will then need to make another collaboration request on the app.

 9) Once you have transferred the funds, the freelancer will receive a notification to inform him/her that he/she can commence work. You may choose to remind the freelancer privately as well.

 10) The freelancer will contact you once he/she has completed the work. Once both parties are agreeable, you will be required to close the project by selecting 'Complete Project' on your project listing.

 11) Following that, it will be up to the freelancer to claim his/her pay.

 12) You are encouraged to leave feedback after the completion of a project.

 13) Should you encounter any disputes and problem, you may choose to file a report by navigating to the left drawer of the app or simply by clicking on the project under the collaboration tab where you will see an option for file a report at the end of the page.
